creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: young girl in profile, PR, in graphite; labeled in black ink on the image: #85; mounted on sheet with 2 other small drawings--further drawings have been removed; other drawings present are labeled: #86, #87; see L2009.52.66b and L2009.52.66c
provenance: Sale, Christie's, London, April 15, 1980, as "Property of a Gentleman," no. 53, as workshop of Cavaliere d'Arpino, with 2009.53.65a-d., to McCrindle; Joseph F. McCrindle, New York (until d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-2009; gave to MIA)
title: Head of a Boy in Profile
